section.title: The component_ref element information item
section.para: component_ref element information items (referred to in this specification as component_ref elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 namespace with local name equal to component_ref.

listitem.para: Every component_ref element MUST contain an attribute information item in the empty namespace and with local name component. The value of this attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier, and MUST match the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset.

Every component_ref element MAY in turn contain zero or more component_ref element children. In addition, component_ref elements which are children of group elements MUST contain at least one component_ref element child.
